Front Desk Officer Job at Gifra Wireless Network Limited




        
    

        
        Gifra Wireless Network Limited is an Internet Service Provider (ISP) company that handles projects including: Broadband-dedicated internet access solutions, Network infrastructure (WLAN/LAN), Smart City/Home Solutions (IoT) - Optimization and Enterprise phone systems (PABX/IP PBX). We carry out any kind of telecom installation.

Gifra Wireless Network Limited also undertakes telecom training and ICT certifications for fresh telecom and ICT trainees. The Company and its team possess a wealth of experience in telecoms, information, and communication technology which enables it to deliver projects in these areas seamlessly.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Front Desk Officer

Job Locations: Abuja and Kano
Job type: Full-time

Job Description


	We are seeking a competent Front Desk Officer to manage customer reception, handle walk-in inquiries, provide basic service support, and ensure smooth front-desk operations.


Requirements


	Applicants must possess an OND / HND / Bachelor’s Degree in any relevant field, with at least one year of customer service or front-desk experience.
	Strong communication skills, good computer proficiency, and a professional appearance are required.


Method of Application 
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: vacancy@gifrawireless.net using the Job Position as the subject of the email.

Alternatively, candidates should submit hard copies of their Applications in an envelope with the position applied for boldly indicated on the envelop at:
Gifra Wireless Network Limited Building,
Block CR11, P.O.W Mafemi Crescent, Behind Prof. Gambari House,
Utako, Abuja.

Applicants must attach the following:


	A detailed resume
	A cover letter stating their experience and suitability for the role
	Copies of relevant certifications or qualifications.
